user_query: I am planning a dinner party for my friends and I need some recipe ideas. Can you suggest a random cake recipe that includes lime as an ingredient? Additionally, could you provide a random salad recipe that contains cucumbers, and a pastry recipe with strawberries? It would be great if you could also include the list of ingredients and instructions for each recipe.

TaskList.description: Fetch a random cake recipe that includes lime as an ingredient.
Fetch a random salad recipe that contains cucumbers.
Fetch a random pastry recipe that includes strawberries.
Compile the list of ingredients and instructions for the cake recipe.
Compile the list of ingredients and instructions for the salad recipe.
Compile the list of ingredients and instructions for the pastry recipe.
